name: Book of Combos 1
description: Intro text for first-tie combiners. Improves your combining success rate.

name: Book of Combos 2
description: Basic text. Together with 1, improves your combining success rate.

name: Book of Combos 3
description: Intermediate text. Along with 1 & 2, improves your combining success rate.

name: Book of Combos 4
description: Advanced text. Along with 1, 2, and 3, improves your combining success rate.

name: Book of Combos 5
description: Pro text. Along with 1, 2, 3, and 4, improves your combining success rate.

name: Alchemy Guide
description: With this book, you too can use alchemy. What will you create?

name: Potion
description: Restores a small amount of Health.

name: Mega Potion
description: Restores a moderate amount of Health.

name: Nutrients
description: Increases the maximum Health level slightly.

name: Mega Nurtrients
description: Medicine that increases the maximum Health level by a small amount.

name: Antidote
description: Effectively removes all traces of poison from your system.

name: Immunizer
description: Medicine that enhances natural recovery ability.

name: Power Juice
description: Allows you to run without becoming fatigued for a period of time.

name: Mega Juice
description: Allows you to run without fatiguing for even longer than Power Juice.

name: Demondrug
description: Increases Attack power, bestowing the strength of Asura himself on user.

name: Mega Demondrug
description: Increases Attack power even more than Demondrug.

name: Power Pill
description: A strengthening pill that endows you with the power of a fierce god.

name: Armorskin
description: Increases Defense by hardening your skin to stone-like armor.

name: Mega Armorskin
description: Increases Defense even more than Armorskin.

name: Armor Pill
description: A pill that temporarily makes your skin as hard as metal.

name: Cool drink
description: A drink that bestows temporary resistance to extreme heat.

name: Hot drink
description: A drink that bestows temporary resistance to extreme cold.

name: Thawing Agent
description: A chemical agent that melts away the frozen tundra in the soul.

name: Psychoserum
description: Temporarily activates an ESP-like ability to sense monsters.

name: Monster Fluid
description: Can be mixed with insect stomach juices to make an adhesive.

name: Monster Broth
description: A broth made from only the thickest of a monster's juices. Quite rich.

name: Monster Essence
description: Further distilled monster broth, although I don't recommend touching it...

name: Thunderbug Juice
description: Fluids of a Thunderbug. When stockpilled, can causes an electrical discharge.

name: Thunderbug Jelly
description: Gelatin from a Great Thunderbug. More powerful than Juice. Easier to use.

name: Herbal Medicine
description: Effectively cures posion, and restores a slight amount of Health.

name: Max Potion
description: Restores Health to the maximum level, enabling a full recovery.

name: Ancient Potion
description: Restores Health and Stamina to maximum levels, enabling a full recovery.

name: Catalyst
description: Mixes with other materials to improve their effect. Cannot be used by itself.

name: Energy Drink
description: Recovers Stamina and cures fatigue. Approved by the Guild.

name: Gunpowder
description: A dangerous chemical that explodes when disturbed or heated.

name: Lifecrystals
description: Mysterious crystals long worshipped as a fount of life.

name: Lifepowder
description: Medicine created by combining Lifecrystals. Strong restorative power.

name: Powercharm
description: Amulet that raises Attack power. The holder gains the strength of a demon.

name: Powertalon
description: Amulet that raises Attack. Made from a Lao-Shan's Claw.

name: Armorcharm
description: Amulet that causes one's skin to become as hard as stone. Raises Defense

name: Armortalon
description: Amulet that raises Defense. Made from a Lao-Shan's Claw.

name: Tranquilizer
description: Medicine that is used as an anesthetic when combined.

name: Raw Meat
description: Meat obtained through carving up a monster. Has many uses.

name: Poisoned Meat
description: Poisons if consumed. Used as bait in traps.

name: Tainted Meat
description: Paralyzes if consumed. Used as bait in traps.

name: Drugged Meat
description: Causes sleepiness if consumed. Used as bait in traps.

name: Rare Steak
description: Meat cooked on the rare side. Gives a small boost to Stamina.

name: Well-Done Steak
description: Well-cooked meat. Gives a medium boost to Stamina.

name: Gourmet Steak
description: A gourmet steak cooked to perfection. Give a full boost to Stamina.

name: Burnt Meat
description: Meat burnt to a crisp. Boots Stamina sometimes, but can also weaken you.

name: Hot Meat
description: Eat to warm the body, ward off the cold, and even recover a bit of Stamina.

name: Cold Meat
description: Eat to cool the body, ward off the heat, and even recover a bit of Stamina.

name: Rare Fish
description: A lightly brazed fish. Recovers red portion of Health Gauge when eaten.

name: Gourmet Fish
description: Recover the red portion of the Health gauge and increases natrual recovery.

name: Gourmet Fish+
description: Recovers red portion of the Health gauge and increases reilience.

name: Burnt Fish
description: A fish burnt to a crisp. Sometimes recovers Health, but can also harm you...

name: Boomerang
description: Returns when thrown. A peculiar shaped weapon form a foreign land.

name: Throwing Knife
description: A standard throwing knife. Goes straight to a target. (Supply Item)

name: Posion Thrw Knf
description: Throwing knift with a posion edge. Has a toxic effect (Supply Item)

name: Sleeping Thr Knf
description: Throwing knife with an edge daubed with sleeping powder. (Supply Item)

name: Paralyze Thr Knf
description: Throwing knife with a paralysis toxin coated edge. (Supply Item)

name: Tranq Thrwng Knf
description: A knife made to assist in the capture of monsters it strikes. (Supply Item)

name: Bomb Material
description: Basic ingredient for making hand-thrown bombs,

name: Paintball
description: Can be thrown at a monster to mark it for easy tracking.

name: Flash Bomb
description: Bomb that flashes brightly upon impact. Blinds monsters.

name: Sonic Bomb
description: Emits a powerful high-frequency sound upon detonation.

name: Dung
description: Monster excrement. One dropping can maximize the fertility of a row.

name: Wyvern Droppings
description: Wyvern excrement. One dropping can maximize the fertility of all rows.

name: Dung Bomb
description: Creates a terrible smell upon impact, which certain wyverns dislike.

name: Smoke Bomb
description: Creates a large cloud of smoke in the area where it lands.

name: Poison Smoke Bmb
description: Smoke bomb containing a toxic chemical. Popular as a household bug bomb.

name: Farcaster
description: Instantly transports you back to base camp.

name: Deodorant
description: Removes item usage blocks. When thrown on the ground, its smoke deodorizes.

name: Tranq Bomb
description: Use to subdue and capture a trapped monster.

name: Spiderweb
description: A spider's web. Very sticky.

name: Net
description: Powerful net able to withstand a certain amount of weight.

name: Trap Tool
description: A tool needed to set up various types of traps, such as the Pitfall Trap.

name: Pitfall Trap
description: Trap for catching certain large monsters. It is tripped by a heavy weight.

name: Shock Trap
description: A trap taht can immobilize a monster. Used for capturing.

name: Lightning Rod
description: Will attract lightning after a while. Can be used in the rain.

name: Barrel Lid
description: A small barrel lid. There appears to be a drawing on it.

name: Small Barrel
description: A small, empty barrel.

name: Large Barrel
description: A large, empty barrel.

name: Sm Barrel-Bomb
description: A small time-bomb.

name: Sm Barrel-Bomb+
description: Upgraded Small Barrel Bomb. Not to be taken lightly despite its size.

name: Lg Barrel-Bomb
description: Powerful bomb triggered by external physical impact.

name: Lg Barrel-Bomb+
description: Upgraded Large Barrel Bomb. Effective against large monsters.

name: Bounce Bomb
description: Bounces into the air when set. This modified bomb requires skill to use.

name: Bounce Bomb+
description: Improved version of the Bounce Bomb. Requires some skill to use.

name: Anti-Dragon Bomb
description: Small time bomb that attaches to an enemy. (Supply Item)

name: Huskberry
description: An empty berry that can grow anywhere. Try planting it in the field.

name: Sm Bone Husk
description: Bone ammunition casing. Stronger than a Huskberry ammunition casing.

name: Lg Bone Husk
description: Bone ammunition casing that can withstand powerful explosions.

name: Normal S Lv1
description: Inexpensive ammo for novices, but don't expect much. Unlimited shots.

name: Normal S Lv2
description: Normal ammo that is more powerful than Normal S Lv1. Maximum of 99 shots.

name: Normal S Lv3
description: Normal ammo that causes more damage than its predecessor. Max 99 shots.

name: Pierce S Lv1
description: Piercing round that causes multiple hits to monsters. Max 60 shots.

name: Pierce S Lv2
description: Piercing round that causes more hits than Lv1 ammo. Max 60 shots.

name: Pierce S Lv3
description: Piercing round that causes the most hits in the class. Max 60 shots.

name: Pellet S Lv1
description: Sprays a wide area and can cause multiple hits at close range. Max 60 shots.

name: Pellet s Lv2
description: Sprays a wide area, causing more hits than Lv1 ammo. Max 60 shots.

name: Pellet S Lv3
description: Sprays a wide area, causing the most hits in the class. Max 60 shots.

name: Crag S Lv1
description: Penetrates and explodes in its target. Quite powerful and stunning. Max 9 shots.

name: Crag S Lv2
description: Very powerful & stunning shot. Penetrates and explodes. Max 9 shots.

name: Crag S Lv3
description: Tremendously powerful and stunning shot. Penetrates and explodes. Max 9 shots.

name: Clust S Lv1
description: Splits into 3 bombs upon impact. Beware of friendly fire. Max 3 shots.

name: Clust S Lv2
description: Splits into 4 bombs upon impact. Beware of friendly fire. Max 3 shots.

name: Clust S Lv3
description: Splits into 5 bombs upon impact. Beware of friendly fire. Max 3 shots.

name: Flaming S
description: Shot effective against monsters vulnerable to fire. Max 60 shots.

name: Water S
description: Shot effective against monsters vulnerable to water. Max 60 shots.

name: Thunder S
description: Shot effective against monsters vulnerable to thunder. Max 60 shots.

name: Freeze S
description: Shot effective against monster vulnerable to ice. Max 60 shots.

name: Dragon S
description: Mysterious ammo that can't be used in normal Bowguns. Maximum of 3 shots.

name: Recov S Lv1
description: Restores a small amount of Health to the target. Maximum of 12 shots.

name: Recov S Lv2
description: Restores a moderate amount of Health to the target. Maximum of 12 shots.

name: Poison S Lv1
description: Poisons target, but may require several shots. Maximum of 12 shots.

name: Poison S Lv2
description: Uses a stronger poison, but may require several shots. Max 8 shots.

name: Para S Lv1
description: Paralyzes target, but may require several shots. Maximum of 12 shots.

name: Para S lv2
description: Stronger paralysis effect, but may require several shots. Max 8 shots.

name: Sleep S Lv1
description: Puts target to sleep, but may require several shots. Maximum of 12 shots.

name: Sleep S Lv2
description: Stronger sleep effect, but may require several shots. Max 8 shots.

name: Tranq S
description: Tranquilizer for use on large trapped monsters. Max 8 shots.

name: Paint S
description: Marks a monster's position on the map for a set time period. Max 99 shots.

name: Demon S
description: Said to bestow the strength of Asura on the target. Max 5 shots.

name: Armor S
description: Said to make the target's skin as hard as stone. Maximum of 5 shots.

name: Empty Bottle
description: A bottle with nothign in it. Nothing more, nothing less.

name: Power Coating
description: Bows loaded with these bottles will have high attack power. Max 50.

name: Poison Coating
description: Bows loaded with these bottles posion enemies on shaft impact. Max 20.

name: ParalysisCoating
description: Bows loaded with these bottles paralyze enemies on shaft impact. Max 20.

name: Sleep Coating
description: Bows loaded with these bottles will put enemies to sleep. Max 20.

name: CloseRngCoating
description: Bows loaded with these get higher close-range power & melee Sharpness. Max 20.

name: Paint Coating
description: Bows loaded with these can make monsters appear on the map. Max 99.

name: Cricket
description: Energetic insect that works well as fishing bait.

name: Worm
description: Nightcrawler for fishing. Use 5 worms to raise soil fertility one level.

name: Firefly
description: A firefly that's always glowing. Works well as fishing bait.

name: Frog
description: A frog. Works well as fishing bait.

name: Tuna Bait
description: The bait preferred by the tuna family of fish.

name: Arrowana Bait
description: The bait preferred by the arrowana family of fish.

name: Goldenfish Bait
description: The bait preferred by Goldenfish.

name: Mega Fishing Fly
description: A fly lure that causes a feeding frenz, no matter what fish is biting.

name: Old Pickaxe
description: A cheap pickaxe with an easily chipped blade.

name: Iron Pickaxe
description: An iron pickaxe with a strong blade.

name: Mega Pickaxe
description: A steel-reinforced pickaxe that is hard to chip.

name: Expand Pickaxe
description: Small pickaxe that appears unsuitable for mining. You sense a strange power...

name: Old Bugnet
description: Cheap and easily torn net for catching bugs.

name: Bugnet
description: Strong net for catching bugs.

name: Mega Bugnet
description: Extremely durable net for catching bugs.

name: BBQ Spit
description: A must-have item for any hunter. Allows for the cookign of meat.

name: Gourmet BBQ Spit
description: A gourmet BBQ spit that allows you to make Well-Done Steaks more easily.

name: Whetstone
description: A standard whetstone. By grinding weawopns with it, Sharpness is restored.

name: Binoculars
description: Lets you observe from a distance.

name: Garbage
description: Junk created when a combination attempt fails.

name: Flute
description: A dangerous device used to attract certain monsters. May break when used.

name: Health Flute
description: Restores the Health of those who hear it. May break when used.

name: Antidote Flute
description: Eliminates poison in the blood of those who hear it. May break when used.

name: Demon Flute
description: Increases the strength of those who hear it. May break when used.

name: Armor Flute
description: Improves the endurance of those who hear it. May break when used.

name: Honey
description: Normal honey. Highly nutritious.

name: Sunset Herb
description: A strange herb with a pleasant smell. Good for combining.

name: Herb
description: A plant that restores a slight amount of Health.

name: Antidote Herb
description: Field plant with antidotal qualities. Relying on it too heavily poses a risk.

name: Fire Herb
description: A plant that has flammable properties.

name: Ivy
description: A lightweight and extremely strong plant.

name: Sleep Herb
description: Plant with sleep-inducing qualities. Can be planted in the field.

name: Sap Plant
description: A plant with leaves coated in sticky sap. Difficult to remove once attached.

name: Felvine
description: A Melynx favorite. They can't resist its charm.

name: Cactus Flower
description: Contains antidotal substances, but has no effect by itself.

name: Hot Pepper
description: Ignites a fire after only a single bite. Warms you up, but too hot to handle.

name: Dosbiscus
description: A large, beautifully colored flowering plant foreign to this land.

name: Mountain Herbs
description: Highly valued natrual grass found only in the mountains. (Account Item)

name: Giant Corn
description: Gigantic corn that's hard to grow in this region. Packed with kernels.

name: Special Mushroom
description: Tiny, difficult to pick. A Mosswine's favorite food. (Account Item)

name: Select Mushroom
description: Selected from Special Mushrooms for their size and taste (Account Item)

name: Blue Mushroom
description: Rare mushroom with a power-enhancing effect.

name: Nitroshroom
description: Rare mushroom with the power to generate heat.

name: Parashroom
description: Mushroom that induces a paralysis effect.

name: Toadstool
description: A poisonous fungus. Perhaps it has other effects as well...

name: Exciteshroom
description: A mushroom with a very strange smell. What would happen if you ate it...?

name: Dragon Toadstool
description: A dangerous fungus said to draw the life out of people. Beware.

name: Spicy Mushroom
description: Speical Spicy Mushroom that recovers a small amount of Stamina.

name: Chaos Mushroom
description: Said to cause chaos. Its spores cause monsters to hallucinate.

name: Paintberry
description: Releases a smelly paint-like juice when broken. Can be planted.

name: Power Seed
description: Temporarily raises Attack power. Short-lived effect if used raw. Plantable.

name: Armor Seed
description: Temporarily increases Defense when consumed. Very invigorating.

name: Dragon Seed
description: Mysterious berry said to be hated by dragons.

name: Scatternut
description: A nut that shatters to pieces when subjected to an impact.

name: Needleberry
description: Berry covered in needle-like thorns. Can be made into bullets. Plantable.

name: Bomberry
description: A berry that explodes when subjected to an impact.

name: Tropical Berry
description: A blood red berry grown in the scorching heat. (Account Item)

name: Frozen Berry
description: A completely frozen berry. Can provide relief from heat and recover Stamina.

name: Red Seed
description: A strange red seed of unknown variety. Can be planted in the field.

name: Green Seed
description: A strange green seed of unknown variety. Can be planted in the field.

name: Yellow Seed
description: A strange yellow seed of unknown variety. Can be planted in the field.

name: Beautiful Shell
description: A beautiful shell with a faint tinge of color. (Account Item)

name: Black Pearl
description: Taken from the depths of a shell. Valued as treasure, as well as material.

name: Giant Blk Pearl
description: Largest and most beautiful of all Black Pearls. Very valuable and hard to find.

name: Stone
description: A small rock. Can be thrown.

name: Disk Stone
description: A disk-shaped stone.

name: Iron Ore
description: Ore that can be smelted into metal and used for many different purposes.

name: Earth Crystal
description: Crystallized remains of micro biotic organisms. A prized weapon abrasive.

name: Machalite Ore
description: Better than Iron Ore. Used to make Machalite. Also called Sparrowstone.

name: Dragonite Ore
description: Better than Machalite. Extremely valuable. Also called Dragonstone.

name: Carbalite Ore
description: An experimental ore also called Spiritstone, it is superior to Dragonite.

name: Eltalite Ore
description: Better than Carbalite Ore. New material with great potential. AKA Kitestone.

name: Union Ore
description: Ore with a metal that can fuse any other material together. AKA Dovestone.

name: Mellanje Ore
description: Soft, easy to work with Ore that combines well. AKA Pidgeonstone.

name: Firestone
description: Combusts at room temp. Mix with suitable materials only. AKA Phoenixstone,

name: Firecell Stone
description: A magma-like ore. Only to be handled by trained hands. AKA Eagle's Eye.

name: Coal
description: A combustible rock that emits a faint warmth. (Account Item)

name: Goldstone Piece
description: A small, pure piece of Goldstone. Commands a high price. (Account Item)

name: Lightcrystal
description: Crystal with a dull glow. Extremely hard, it is used for tools in the armory.

name: Novacrystal
description: Brightly glowing crystal. Extremely hard, it is used for tools in the armory.

name: Purecrystal
description: 100% pure and extremely hard, it’s even used in workshop machinery.

name: Antiseptic Stone
description: An unnatural Crystal with enhanced antiseptic qualities.

name: Ice Crystal
description: WILL not thaw at room temperature. Confirmed to increase ore density.

name: Rainbow Ore
description: Beautiful ore. Colors and properties depend on many variables.

name: Great Stone
description: Looks normal enough, but it has a great presence. Contains an ancient aura.

name: Armor Stone
description: Ore with a unique reaction to heat. Can be combined to make an armor coating.

name: Armor Sphere
description: Its unique reaction to heat can be used to increase armor strength.

name: Armor Sphere+
description: Dense and high quality. Treasured as a supplement to armor strength.

name: Hrd Armor Sphere
description: Hard, high density Armor Sphere. Rare material used in high strength armor.

name: Hvy Armor Sphere
description: Thick, Rarely obtained, the bar on armor dense Armor Sphere. it raises strength.

name: Ryl Armor Sphere
description: Incredibly rare Armor Sphere with a sparkle. Further improves armor.

name: Tru Armor Sphere
description: Near impossible to find Armor Sphere with hard to extract latent abilities.

name: Knife Mackerel
description: A fish with a dorsal fin hard enough to be used to sharpen weapons.

name: Sushifish
description: A delicious fish that restores a small amount of Health when consumed.

name: Sleepyfish
description: A fish with sleep-inducing properties.

name: Pin Tuna
description: A fish with a jaw covered in tiny needle-like spikes.

name: Rumblefish
description: A fish that cracks open when killed.

name: Scatterfish
description: A fish that shatters to pieces when killed.

name: Burst Arrowana
description: A fish that ruptures open when killed.

name: Bomb Arrowana
description: A fish that explodes when killed.

name: Glutton Tuna
description: WILL devour anything in its path, and sometimes these remain inside.

name: Gastronome Tuna
description: An enormous Glutton Tuna. Will eat anything, matter the size. no

name: Speartuna
description: A rare and valuable giant-sized fish. What could it be used for...?

name: Small Goldenfish
description: A curiously small, gold fish. Commands a high price. fare,

name: Goldenfish
description: A rare fish whose entire body is gold. Can be sold for profit. (Account Item)

name: Silverfish
description: A strange fish with a silver body. Quite valuable. (Account Item)

name: Ancient Fish
description: A precious fish which can be almost entirely used as material.

name: Springnight Carp
description: A species of carp whose arrival signals the start of breeding season.

name: Tailed Frog
description: Rare frog that retained its tall. This happens under special conditions.

name: Insect Husk
description: The remains of a dead Insect.

name: Yambug
description: Yam-like bug that exudes a scent that drives tuna wild. Great fishing bait.

name: Bughopper
description: An insect that exudes a scent that drives arrowana wild. Great fishing bait.

name: Snakebee Larva
description: A snake-like larva with a scent that Goldenfish just love. Great fishing bait.

name: Godbug
description: An insect said to live for a thousand years.

name: Bitterbug
description: Contains a bitter essence. Has a 50% chance of curing poison if consumed.

name: Flashbug
description: An insect that emits a powerful flash when it dies.

name: Thunderbug
description: An insect that emits electricity when struck. Has many applications.

name: Carpenterbug
description: Viscous body fluids and sharp jaws make this Insect an artisan.

name: King Scarab
description: The royal class of the scarabs, with a hard shell and lustrous wings.

name: Emperor Cricket
description: Exceptionally strong shell makes it a good counter-part to soft materials.

name: Killer Beetle
description: Insect with a hard shell and dazzling wings. Used as an abrasive.

name: Hercudrome
description: Said to be the world's strongest bug. Widely used in making equipment.

name: Rare Scarab
description: A rare, prized insect. Used to increase the power of metal objects.

name: PhantomButterfly
description: Rarely seen by humans, its wings shimmer like precious gems.

name: Royal Rhino
description: Beetle with a jewel-like shine and prized by collectors. (Account Item)

name: Divine Rhino
description: Beetle that glows as if from the heavens. Loved by collectors. (Account Item)

name: Rainbow Insect
description: Beautiful insect material. Colors and properties depend on many variables.

name: Great Hornfly
description: Insect with a giant horn, massive shell, and wings of butterfly-like beauty.

name: Great Ladybug
description: Giant Insect with a very hard shell. Protects crops by eating harmful pests.

name: Screamer
description: A monster's organ. emits a shrill internal If broken, it sound.

name: Poison Sac
description: A monster's Internal organ. Contains a lethal poison.

name: Toxin Sac
description: A monster's internal organ filled with potent toxin. Dangerous, even to touch.

name: DeadlyPoisonSac
description: A monster's filled with @ most toxin. Internal organ lethal Use extreme care.

name: Paralysis Sac
description: A monster's internal organ filled with a paralyzing neurotoxin,

name: Sleep Sac
description: A monster's internal organ filled with a powder that causes sleep when inhaled.

name: Coma Sac
description: A monster's organ that filled with a powder internal can induce a coma.

name: Flame Sac
description: A monster's internal organ. Contains a very flammable powder.

name: Inferno Sac
description: A monster's internal organ filled with a powder that ignites when touched.

name: Blazing Fire Sac
description: A monster's internal organ filled with an explosive powder. Watch out!

name: Electro Sac
description: The internal organ of a Khezu. Releases electricity If disturbed.

name: Thunder Sac
description: The internal organ of a Khezu. Contains unequaled electrical energy.

name: Lightning Sac
description: A monster's internal organ charged with electricity & the rumbling of thunder.

name: Power Extract
description: Gypceros extract. The secret to Its ability to run fast and far.

name: Pale Extract
description: Khezu extract. Has the ability to amplify the effects of medicines.

name: Sm Monster Bone
description: A very useful material, indispensable for both hunting and daily life.

name: Med Monster Bone
description: Has more uses than small bone. Usually carved to make any Item.

name: Lg Monster Bone
description: Indispensable for crafting one-piece items. Bone can be connected to shell.

name: Monster Bonet
description: Top quality monster bone. Hard to find but a nearly unbreakable material.

name: Hrd Monster Bone
description: A monster's most unique bone. Priceless strength, but difficult to work.

name: Hvy Monster Bone
description: Strong bone from only the toughest of wyverns. It's very thick and heavy.

name: Eldr Dragon Bone
description: You can sense the elder dragon's dignity from this massive bone alone.

name: BigEDragonBone
description: Top-notch bone from a large dragon. Feels like It could last forever.

name: Mystery Bone
description: A well-worn bone. Not sturdy enough to use in combination.

name: Unknown Skull
description: Animal skull. So worn and weathered, it's unidentifiable.

name: Master's Skull
description: The remains of a top hunter who once let his guard down.

name: Bone
description: Just a bone. So worn and weathered, it's unidentifiable.

name: RobustWyvernBone
description: A bird wyvern's robust bone. It’s easy to work with and is very durable.

name: Brute Bone
description: The stout bone of a brutish monster. An easy to work material.

name: Giant Bone
description: A fat, cut large bone. Can be in the workshop to make crafting material.

name: Stout Bone
description: The stout, hard bone of a brute. Rigid, it is priceless for crafting,

name: Massive Bone
description: Very hard bone from a very large beast. Its worth as material is beyond words.

name: Wyvern Fang
description: Used for Bowgun munitions. Combined with explosives, it makes spreading shots.

name: Wyvern Stone
description: A unique item formed by the hardening of foreign materials inside a wyvern.

name: Big Wyvern Stone
description: A Wyvern Stone that's had years upon years to form. It has a mysterious glow.

name: BigEDragonJewel
description: Ultra-rarely does a giant stone like this form inside an Elder Dragon.

name: White Liver
description: A white liver, just as stated. Its texture is adored. (Account Item)

name: Popo Tongue
description: A Popo tongue is popular, healthy, and enjoyable to eat. (Account Item)

name: Secret Pouch
description: The pouch carried by a Melynx. The insides are a jumble. (Account Item)

name: CarapaceonBrains
description: The brain matter of a Carapaceon. A widely known delicacy. (Account Item)

name: CarapaceonBrain+
description: First-class Carapaceon Brains. An Einsteinian delicacy. (Account Item)

name: Piscine Liver
description: Internal organ from a Piscine Wyvern. A great cure-all. (Account Item)

name: Wyvern Tears
description: Precious tears wept only on special occasions. (Account Item)

name: Wyvern Sobs
description: Precious crocodile tears wept only on special occasions. (Account Item)

name: Territorial Dung
description: Droppings used by a monster (Account to mark territory. Item)

name: TerritorialDungt+
description: Large droppings used by a monster to mark territory. (Account Item)

name: Crab Pearl
description: A jewel polished by time inside a monster's body. (Account Item)

name: Crab Pearl+
description: A treasured jewel polished by time inside a monster's body. (Account Item)

description: Mosswine hide. It's covered in moss.

name: Kelbi Horn

name: Kelbi Hide
